name: Yuansheng Bathhouse
description: In the 80s, China experienced one of the most dramatic changes to humankind that almost sounds like a fictional story - massive privatization converting billions of people's lives overnight. Xiaoliu, a high school student living in an industrious city in China, woke up the following day and finding everyone in the city had disappeared. Stumbling into a neighborhood bathhouse, he found a temp job as a back scrubber and encountered a few customers who changed his life.
